snippet: Even those who are skeptical of scams may be surprised by the eye-popping payouts one Brooklyn man made to a Times Square psychic in hopes of being united with the woman he loved.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column describes situation in which unnamed Brooklyn man paid over $700,000 to Times Square fortune teller Priscilla Kelly Delmaro in effort to rid himself of evil spirits sabotaging his relationship with woman he loved; says Delmaro displayed impressive creativity while man showed fathomless gullibility.
lead_paragraph: Even those who are skeptical of scams may be surprised by the eye-popping payouts one Brooklyn man made to a Times Square psychic in hopes of being united with the woman he loved.

headline.print_headline: A Fortuneteller Cost Him Fortune After Fortune
headline.main: A Manhattan Fortuneteller Cost Him Fortune After Fortune
